title: Potential 1st ban in 6yrs, won't even be my fault.
body: Been playing for almost 6 years and never once been banned/suspended. Recenetly I have been getting spammed teams like this https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3272302826/215880742?tab=overview and https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3272609967/215880742?tab=overview ,  I'm going to have my 1st ever ban soon if this keeps up and It won't even be my fault. And this match here https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/3272280274/215880742?tab=overview Ashe, Annie, and Kayne all left at the same time about 10min in, so that's 23 deaths between the 3 of them in just 10 min. This is going to make me start being toxic, which im not hence 0 bans ever.
